import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { projectData } from '../data/projectData'; const ProjectDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [project, setProject] = useState(null); const [relatedProjects, setRelatedProjects] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { // Load project data if (projectData[id]) { setProject(projectData[id]); // Load related projects (other projects from the same category) const related = Object.values(projectData) .filter(p => p.category === projectData[id].category && p !== projectData[id]) .slice(0, 3); setRelatedProjects(related); } }, [id]); if (!project) { return (

); }; export default ProjectDetail;
